Reviews.Title: Camera is very small but works pretty good
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: For the price you can spend about $50 more and get a little bit bigger camera that the screen is bigger. But for what we paid it serves it purpose!

ProductInfo.Features:
This Kit includes 7 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
Canon PowerShot ELPH 115 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 8x Optical Zoom with a 28mm Wide-Angle Lens and 720p HD Video Recording (Blue)
8 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Universal Memory Card Wallet
Deluxe Design Digital Camera Carrying Case with Pocket and Strap - Package of LCD Screen Protectors
Flexible Legged Mini Table Tripod - Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - BONUS!! Free 25 Quality Prints (Promo code on invoice)
